description: Generate and answer based on the provided sources

input_variables.name: ask
input_variables.description: User question(i.e., How do I execute task A?)

input_variables.name: sources
input_variables.description: Sources retrieved to answer the user question (i.e., file1.pdf: To execute task A you need to access system B. file2.pdf: System B is used when users need to execute task A.)

input_variables.name: bot_description
input_variables.description: Describe what the bot is and do.

input_variables.name: previous_answer
input_variables.description: The previous answer generated by the bot.
